name: Wearable ultrasound system
Problem Statement: This technology solves the problem of requiring manual operation for ultrasound imaging and delays in diagnosis by providing automated, hands-free imaging and real-time, AI-powered diagnostic insights.
Explanation: Uses AI for real-time imaging and diagnosis. This device, developed by Sonologi, provides automated, hands-free ultrasound imaging while a patient is wearing it. AI-powered analytics in the system allow clinicians to access actionable insights in real-time, improving decision-making and patient outcomes.
